attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned express our deep concern about traffic restrictions expected to be in place in London during Olympic Games 2012
We express our distress that the intended traffic restrictions will cost small businesses revenue & lose UK massive amounts of productivity.

It is our belief that depriving workers of time with their families in order to struggle in an over capacity transport network so that a minority may travel unhindered to and from a sporting event, is simply an insult added to Londoners for the injury of paying for the Olympics.

We the undersigned petition HM Government to take action to  remove intended traffic restriction for roads during Olympics2012 , leaving all of our already congested road transport lanes free for use by all motorised vehicles.
